metadata.title: CVE-2024-2824 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Matthias-Wandel jhead 3.08 and classified ascritical. This issue affects the function PrintFormatNumber of the fileexif.c. The manipulation leads to heap-based buffer overflow. The attackmay be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public andmay be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-257711.

criterions.comment: jhead package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
